page.title: 14BANKING IN LONGTOWN.
page.content: The Banking requirements of the inhabitants of Longtown District are provided by two Clearing Banks (Midland & Barclays) together with a branch of the Cumberland Building Society.As can be appreciated,a large proportion of business is with the farming community and those connected with it.An estimated 25% of Midland Bank customers are in this category. There is little industry in the area and the remainder of business mainly consists of Haulage,Retail and Construction.Of the Personal Customers,a large proportion are employed at the nearby Ministry of Defence Installations.In recent years,there has been very little new residential development in the town and therefore the population is largely static.Consequently new accounts are difficult to obtain.
